heading: HR01378
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, WITH REGARD THE RECENT ENCOUNTER BETWEEN THE PHILIPPINE NAVY AND SEVERAL VIETNAMESE FISHERMEN, RESULTING TO THE DEATH OF TWO, IN ORDER TO PREVENT THE  SAME FROM HAPPENING AGAIN IN THE FUTURE AS WELL AS TO URGE THE GOVERNMENT TO COME UP  WITH A  CLEAR STRATEGY IN THE WEST PHILIPPINE SEA
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2017-10-09
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01378
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, WITH REGARD THE RECENT ENCOUNTER BETWEEN THE PHILIPPINE NAVY AND SEVERAL VIETNAMESE FISHERMEN, RESULTING TO THE DEATH OF TWO, IN ORDER TO PREVENT THE SAME FROM HAPPENING AGAIN IN THE FUTURE AS WELL AS TO URGE THE GOVERNMENT TO COME UP WITH A CLEAR STRATEGY IN THE WEST PHILIPPINE SEA
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2017-10-03
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2017-10-09
